meanings.definition: A proportion or share in relation to a whole expressed in hundredths.
meanings.sent1: In math class, we learned how to calculate percentages to find the part of a whole.
meanings.sent2: The store offered a discount of 20 percent off all items.
meanings.sent3: I tried to eat my brother's cake, but he only gave me a tiny percentages of it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room, brightening it by a percentages.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful blocks to help us understand percentages better.
